ABOUT WORK IN-PROGRESS
Detail from the Unravelled Series. Unravelled silk prints of deleted images. Billboard installation.
Meadow 672. Archival images relating to the history of the place this work was exhibited at. Digitally printed silk.
Marlene. Retrieved via trash-recovery software from my computer. Digitally printed silk.
Madame X. Retrieved via trash-recovery software from my computer. Digitally printed silk.
Sid. Retrieved via trash-recovery software from my computer. Digitally printed silk.
Collective Vomit. Images found via trash-recovery software on USB sticks belonging to participants of a workshop.
Terms and Conditions. One fifth of Airbnb’s T&C we agree to when using their service. Marker on dust-sheet.
Trust Me. From my spam folder. Acrylic on cling film.
We. From my spam folder. Acrylic on dust-sheet.
I need. From my spam folder. Marker on dust-sheet.
Help. From my spam folder. Marker on dust-sheet.
Veintre de Tiburón. Image found on used USB sticks bought in the informal markets of Cali. Digitally printed silk.

Zebras, Blanks and Blobs. Image families from the University of Edinburgh’s collections. Artist book.
